keywords.value: Isaacs, Wayne (New York, NY, Police Officer)
keywords.name: persons

lead_paragraph: Officer Wayne Isaacs shot Delrawn Small in a traffic dispute in the Cypress Hills neighborhood on July 4, according to initial police accounts.

headline.print_headline: Officer Pleads Not Guilty  in Fatal Off-Duty Shooting
headline.main: Brooklyn Officer Pleads Not Guilty in Fatal Off-Duty Shooting

snippet: Officer Wayne Isaacs shot Delrawn Small in a traffic dispute in the Cypress Hills neighborhood on July 4, according to initial police accounts....
abstract: New York City Police Officer Wayne Isaacs pleads not guilty to second-degree murder and manslaughter in fatal shooting of Delrawn Small during traffic dispute in July in Brooklyn; if convicted, Isaacs could face life in prison.
